name: Inner & Outer Mechanisms 6: Elements of Architecture
description:
This is one of my groundbreaking isometric designs, part of the 'Inner & Outer Mechanisms' series.

It was drawn over the course of 5 days in August 2020 on isometric paper.

This scan is now available for the first time as an NFT.

I'm delighted to be releasing it.

*About Tiago Hands:

Tiago currently runs a Youtube channel teaching mathematics proofs. He has roughly 41,000 organic followers on Instagram and since January 2014 has been producing geometric art.
